name: Brother B's Vicious Mockery
description:
Come along on a journey with Brother B as he single-handedly takes on a legion of chickens with nothing but his deeply cutting words, a stack of holy books, and his DnD companions!

How To Play

Hit the chickens by launching books at them. If you clear all the chickens before you run out of “shots”, then you move on to the next round!

Companion Power

Each round you may select one special power. Press the Companion Power button when you are ready to use it. You must have at least one “shot” left in the round.

Extra Lives Bonus

The leftover shots at the end of the round will be added to a Bonus. For every 3 extra shots you accrue, you will receive an extra life.

Known Bugs

If the round ends with a Game Over, but the chickens have all been vanquished: Press “PAUSE”, then “RESUME GAME” to trigger a recalibration of the game state
